name: Trello List Expand/Collapse
description:
- Collapse Trello list
- Expand Trello list to 2, 3, 4, 5 columns
additional_info: !!!---8/17/2017:Important Update---!!! - No more space on the right of the lists ;-) - Support up to 7 columns PLEASE READ - You may use this style with FlexyTrello Chrome Extension(tested) or Firefox add-on(un-tested). This will allow you to collapse/expand the lists more easily. - If you want to use this style without the extension, you must duplicate and modify the first section in the style for EACH board and apply the sections to the board URLs. Instructions are included in comments. Other style used in the screenshot: - trello-color-tweaks Other chrome extensions used in the screenshot: - Next Step for Trello which display checklist items in the cards - Planyway: calendar for Trello - GTD: Trello Card Links which turn url in card title into short and clickable links
